name: gemini-reels-stories-bot
description: A Messenger-like bot powered by Gemini, capable of generating themed text, creating and editing images, and generating creative stories with optional voice and song suggestions, with added user data management features.

scripts.start: echo 'No dedicated start script for this simple setup. Serve index.html directly.'
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp index.html metadata.json dist/ && cp -r components services netlify types.ts constants.ts App.tsx index.tsx dist/ 2>/dev/null || :
